text: Arau sihamtara majara yijane mukti paba buli i'uchuphe dharana karaile, taka te'om ka’le, ‘tomara manibara ocarata mora katha ullekha karaiba’. Kintu cayatane taka te'omra bisaye tara manibara ocarata byakta karaibalai paharaa'i dile. Phalata i'uchuphaka arau ke'iba bachara karaagarata thakibalagiya ha’la
